messages.subject: OT (kind of): Need any electric guitars repaired?
messages.msgSnippet: Hope this doesn t get me into trouble!  Dh has been dabbling in the guitar repair biz lately. He s repaired/modified a few of his own as well as one
messages.messageBody:
Hope this doesn't get me into trouble! <g>

Dh has been dabbling in the guitar repair biz lately. He's
repaired/modified a few of his own as well as one belonging to a
friends' kid. He does good work and he's VERY meticulous.

However, he can't start charging for the service until he gets some
more experience. So if anyone has an electric guitar in need of
repair lmk and I'll pass on the info so he can decide whether or not
it's a repair he can handle. All you'd have to pay for is shipping
(we're in Utah) and parts.

Any takers??? Beth
